property.name: text
property.value:
This Ptera model serves as a sub workflow model for reading power consumptions from a URI for a building. The initial TemperatureReader process reads power comsumptions from the URI. If there is an IO reading exception, the ExceptionHandler process is activated, otherwise, The power consumption is then stored in an array of recent readings by the Shift state. The Shift process also computes the avarage of recent power consumptions. If the avarage is higher than some certain power consumption threshhold, the process Count is activated that counts the number of times that average power consumptions higher are higher than the threshhold. If the number of times that average power consumptions are higher than the threshhold exceeds a certain value, the EmailAlert process is activated that sends emails to registered email addresses configured using the file pointed by mailConfigureFile.
Author: Dai Bui

entity.name: LocalDataFileReader
entity.doc: Read an entire file and output as a string

entity.name: OnlineDataFileReader
entity.doc: Read an entire file and output as a string

property.name: expression
property.value: "Building " + building + " power consumption is " + power + " kW"
